sentences.sContent: He cannibalized his old bicycle to repair his tricycle.
sentences.sContent_eng: He cannibalized his old bicycle to repair his tricycle.
sentences.sCn: 他把旧自行车的零件拆下来修配他的三轮车。

sentences.sContent: A game that is very popular with these young swimmers is the underwater tricycle race.
sentences.sContent_eng: A game that is very popular with these young swimmers is the underwater tricycle race.
sentences.sCn: 这些幼小的游泳运动员非常喜爱的一种游戏是水下三轮车比赛。

sentences.sContent: The extension bridge is steep,so the tricyclist has to get off his tricycle and push it up.
sentences.sContent_eng: The extension bridge is steep,so the tricyclist has to get off his tricycle and push it up.
sentences.sCn: 引桥陡滑，三轮车车夫必须下车把三轮车推上桥。

phrases.pCn: 机动三轮车；三轮摩托车

trans.tranOther: a bicycle with three wheels, especially for young children
